Checks whether the path contains the corresponding path element.

@1@ Checks whether {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/path/root_path|root_path()}} is empty.

@2@ Checks whether {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/path/root_name|root_name()}} is empty.

@3@ Checks whether {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/path/root_directory|root_directory()}} is empty.

@4@ Checks whether {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/path/relative_path|relative_path()}} is empty.

@5@ Checks whether {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/path/parent_path|parent_path()}} is empty.

@6@ Checks whether {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/path/filename|filename()}} is empty.

@7@ Checks whether {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/path/stem|stem()}} is empty.

@8@ Checks whether {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/path/extension|extension()}} is empty.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if the corresponding path component is not empty, {{c|false}} otherwise.
